tool_description: An API showing all the latest news about costs, prices, and money to stay up-to-date with the current inflation.
name: Money News Live
title: Money News Live

api_list.name: Get all money news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the news about money and inflation from all over the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://money-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "money-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://money-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "money-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
